alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wright and southeastern Sherburne Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buffalo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Monticello and Big Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 187 and 201. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 195 and 211. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 132 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
